- Clone https://github.com/google/protobuf
- Compile to get protoc binary
- Execute protoc binary to generate .pb files
- Move generated files to src and headers directories.
- Modify library path (where protobuf has been compiled)
- Add library: libprotobuf.lib

Windows:
Don't forget to add in Instruments.pb.h: #pragma warning(disable : 4996)

Environment variables example:
CMAKE_C_COMPILER C:\Cygwin64\bin\gcc.exe
CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER C:\Cygwin64\bin\g++.exe
CMAKE_ROOT D:\Programmation\Tools\CMake3.0.2\share\cmake-3.0

Cmake variables example:
PROTOBUF_INCLUDE_DIR D:/Programmation/Tools/protobuf/src
PROTOBUF_LIBRARY D:/Programmation/Tools/protobuf/vsprojects/Debug/libprotobuf.lib
PROTOBUF_PROTOC_EXECUTABLE D:/Programmation/Tools/protobuf/vsprojects/Debug/protoc.exe
